name: Vito
appearance: A sturdy man of Latin American descent, dressed in the plain uniform of an auxiliary police officer, with a friendly but somewhat clumsy demeanor.
personality: Honest, good-natured, and simple-minded; well-meaning but not particularly sharp or suspicious.
background: Vito is a local auxiliary police officer in Cassandra. He is known for being kind-hearted and dependable, though lacking in experience and investigative insight.
goals: Do his job and assist the local police
Maintain peace and order in Cassandra
secrets: Last year before Christmas, he met the unknown Black girl (victim of the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case) who asked him if there were any cheap rooms for rent. He said no, and the next day she was murdered. He forgot about this after the case was shelved.

clues.clueText: Last year before Christmas, he met the unknown Black girl (victim of the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case) who asked him if there were any cheap rooms for rent. He said no, and the next day she was murdered.
His girlfriend Helen was the woman Philip tried to flirt with at the Reindeer Bar on the day of the 2003 murder case.

notes: Vito is a good-hearted but unsophisticated auxiliary officer. He met the victim of the 2002 murder case the day before she was killed, but forgot about this after the case was shelved. His girlfriend Helen was involved in the 2003 Reindeer Bar incident when Philip tried to flirt with her.
